title: BRIEF-CMIC Ocean En Tech Holding Co Says Shelf Drilling Gets Contract From Oil And Natural Gas Corp
text:
BRIEF-CMIC Ocean En Tech Holding Co Says Shelf Drilling Gets Contract From Oil And Natural Gas Corp

Stock Markets 58 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 11:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-CMIC Ocean En Tech Holding Co Says Shelf Drilling Gets Contract From Oil And Natural Gas Corp Oct 11 (Reuters) - Cmic Ocean En Tech Holding Co Ltd : * ON OCT 9, GETS AWARD FOR 3-YEAR CONTRACT FOR TRIDENT II JACK-UP RIG WITH OIL AND NATURAL GAS CORP FOR OPERATIONS IN INDIA * PLANNED START-UP OF OPERATIONS IS Q1 2020 * SHELF DRILLING, JOINTLY OWNED BY CO, CHINA MERCHANTS & GREAT WALL OCEAN STRATEGY & TECHNOLOGY FUND GETS CONTRACT

BRIEF-CMIC Ocean En Tech Holding Co Says Shelf Drilling Gets Contract From Oil And Natural Gas Corp
description: BRIEF-CMIC Ocean En Tech Holding Co Says Shelf Drilling Gets Contract From Oil And Natural Gas Corp
